name: iso-container-codes
title: ISO 6346 Container Type Codes
description: List of ISO 6346 Container Type Codes

fields.name: code
fields.description: A 4 digit Alpha Numeric Code uniquely describing the container as defined by ISO 6346

fields.name: length
fields.description: External length in feet of the container

fields.name: height
fields.description: External height of container in feet

fields.name: group
fields.description: 4 Digit ISO 6346 describing the group the codes belong to, more regularly used when sending electronic shipping messages

fields.name: code
fields.description: A 4 digit Alpha Numeric Code uniquely describing the container/group as defined by ISO 6346
